title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
summary: Enable multi-factor authentication for a secure and compliant login experience.
description: Develop a robust multi-factor authentication system that secures user access through a combination of verification mechanisms, such as passwords, one-time passcodes (OTPs), mobile authenticator apps, or biometric input. The system should comply with industry-standard security protocols and banking compliance frameworks like PCI-DSS and GDPR. Include features for trusted device management, session expiration, and password recovery workflows to enhance account security while maintaining user convenience.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Design and implement a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products and services.
description: Create a customized dashboard that aggregates all relevant banking information for each user, including accounts, balances, transactions, and tailored banking product recommendations. Integrate machine learning algorithms to determine product eligibility and personalize offers based on the customer’s financial profile. Ensure real-time data sync with backend systems and design an intuitive, accessible interface to optimize the user experience.

title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
summary: Develop a user interface that delivers a consistent and accessible experience across devices.
description: Implement a responsive front-end architecture ensuring consistent performance across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Follow best practices in UX/UI design and comply with accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1 to provide inclusive support for users with disabilities. Optimize for touch interaction, load times, and readability, ensuring that the digital experience mirrors the ease and efficiency of in-branch engagements.

title: Streamlined Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable digital account opening and service modification through intuitive workflows.
description: Develop guided, self-service workflows for new account opening, product subscriptions, and service modifications. Automate Know Your Customer (KYC) checks, validation, and form pre-filling using existing customer data to minimize user input and errors. Include dynamic form validation, step tracking, and progress indicators. Ensure compliance with financial regulations and support for digital signatures where appropriate to facilitate a fully paperless process.

title: Save and Resume Applications
summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and resume them later from any device.
description: Implement the capability for users to securely save partially completed forms and resume them later after authentication. Store saved data in encrypted format with proper access control to ensure confidentiality. Include automated data retention cleanup policies, notifications for incomplete applications, and clear indicators for progress tracking. Ensure that saved sessions can be resumed across devices without compromising security or integrity.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Provide a secure feature for customers to upload, validate, and manage required documents.
description: Enable customers to upload necessary documents directly through the portal for account verification and service requests. Support common file formats and implement constraints for file size and type validation. Use encryption at rest and in transit for all uploaded files and integrate anti-malware scanning before acceptance. Include administrative review tools and notifications for pending or approved document statuses.

title: Real-Time Request Status Updates and Notifications
summary: Offer real-time tracking and notifications for all customer requests and actions.
description: Develop a tracking mechanism that allows users to monitor the progress of their account requests, modifications, and uploaded documents in real-time. Implement an event-driven notification system that sends automated alerts via email or SMS whenever significant status changes occur. Integrate audit event triggers across backend workflows to ensure status accuracy and provide transparency to the customer throughout the process.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain a complete audit trail of user interactions for transparency and compliance.
description: Implement an audit mechanism that captures all relevant user interactions, including logins, updates, uploads, and requests, with timestamps and activity classifications. Provide users access to a summarized version of their history for reference while maintaining detailed logs for internal auditing and compliance reporting. Ensure audit logs are immutable, securely stored, and retrievable for bank regulatory inspections.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the self-service portal seamlessly with the bank’s core banking system.
description: Develop a secure integration layer enabling real-time data synchronization between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking platform. Implement APIs and middleware to manage data flow of customer profiles, transactions, accounts, and workflow statuses. Ensure high reliability, low latency, and fault tolerance. Include performance monitoring, request throttling, and retry mechanisms to handle peak loads effectively.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Framework
summary: Implement an access management framework based on defined customer and staff roles.
description: Build a role-based access control system ensuring customers, administrators, and other bank personnel access only authorized sections and data. Establish granular permission levels and security profiles aligned with operational hierarchies. Integrate dynamic policy enforcement and real-time privilege audits to prevent unauthorized access, while ensuring the framework is adaptable for future service expansions.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Create a dedicated database to handle portal transactions efficiently and reliably.
description: Design and deploy a dedicated, high-performance database architecture to store customer workflows, session data, documents, and activity logs. Employ database partitioning, indexing, caching, and load balancing for performance optimization. Implement backup, replication, and disaster recovery strategies to maintain business continuity and data integrity. Ensure encryption standards are applied both in transit and at rest.
